concept.title: [WebUI] Create and Run Web UI Test Case using Record and Playback in

conbody.p: This tutorial demonstrates how to create a Web UI test case with using Record and Playback.
Go through the scenario "Sign in the shopping page to purchase a tank top" to get familiar with these features. The basic steps are:

ol.li: Create a new project to store recorded actions.

Interact with the web page.
Sign in.
Purchase a tank top.

conbody.p: Shopping Cart sample project is available here.
